name: SpaceBao
description:
This is prototype game made in ~24 hours to get acquainted with Unity again.

A feline creature aboard their Bao spaceship is drifting through space, gathering Stardust in order to pursue its aimless voyage...

Direct your ship with your mouse/finger tip.

Click/Tap to enable the thruster. This consumes Stardust.

Catch big stars to score and regain Stardust.
